title: Transfers Heat Up: EF Lands Asgreen, Movistar Wins Castrillo Sweepstakes, Vollering Linked to FDJ-Suez
content:
Transfers are heating up in the rider market, with EF, Movistar, UAE, and FDJ-Suez all making key moves.

Read the full article at Transfers Heat Up: EF Lands Asgreen, Movistar Wins Castrillo Sweepstakes, Vollering Linked to FDJ-Suez on Velo.
